title: Calculating Area and Perimeter Using Functions
description: Create a program that calculates the area and perimeter of a rectangle using functions. The program should have two functions: one to calculate the area and another to calculate the perimeter. The user should be prompted to enter the length and width of the rectangle, and then the program should display the calculated area and perimeter.
sample_output:
The area of the rectangle is 15
The perimeter of the rectangle is 16
